Do you need quality and fast Virtual Private Servers in Europe?

CentoHost.com is a brand of Globalhost d.o.o. which is one of the leading web hosting companies since 2002. We use the latest Dell server technology in our own data center to ensure that our customers get the best performance out of their websites. Our wide selection of web hosting services will cater to your hosting needs whether you're making a small, simple website, or a high powered, high traffic website. Our main goal is to provide the best technology available with exceptional customer support. With a large client base comes a diverse range of Web hosting requirements. We have tailored our company around these needs by providing flexible and scalable services.

We use premium Dell PowerEdge series hardware in own data center in Europe, ensuring you receive the best performance for your VPS.
Virtualization platform on all our servers is OpenVZ.

Technical Specifications:
  • Free setup
  • Guaranteed resource
  • Free DDoS protection
  • Remote reboot
  • Serial console access
  • Ability to install and customize applications
  • Fully and self managed solution
  • Simple upgrade
  • Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, OpenSUSE

Included with your Virtual Private Server:
- SolusVM Control Panel - You can reinstall and manage your Virtual Privat Server with SolusVM control panel.
- Full Root Access - All our VPSes include full SSH root user access, you are free to create/add any extra users as you like on your VPS.
- Hardware RAID10 arrays - All servers operate in the hardware RAID powered RAID10 arrays, this ensures the best disk speed and safety data.
- Unmetered Traffic - All our Virtual Private Servers comes with unmetered data transfer.
- Free DDoS Protection - Our network are protected with advanced L3+L4 DDoS protection system.
- IPv4 and IPv6 network - All VPS include both IPv4 and IPv6 network connection and addresses.
- No Setup Price - All Virtual Private Servers are with completely Free Setup, without hidden fees.
- Instant Setup - Your Virtual Private Server will be ready for use in 15 seconds after payment.
